trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating" /> event that occurs when components are added to the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating" /> que ocorre quando os componentes são adicionados à caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating> event is raised when components are about to be added to the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating> evento é gerado quando os componentes estão prestes a ser adicionado à caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> provides data indicating the designer that has requested that the components be added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> Fornece dados indicando que o designer que solicitou que os componentes sejam adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: The following example method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> that indicates the designer host that is about to receive a new component or set of components:
trans-unit.target: O método de exemplo a seguir retorna um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> que indica o designer host que está prestes a receber um novo componente ou conjunto de componentes:

trans-unit.source: The designer host that is making the request.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer que está fazendo a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that made the request to create toolbox components.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma instância do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> que fez a solicitação para criar componentes de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that made the request to create toolbox components, or <see langword="null" /> if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> que fez a solicitação para criar componentes de caixa de ferramentas, ou <see langword="null" /> se nenhum host designer foi fornecida para o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: This property can be `null` if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser `null` se nenhum host designer foi fornecida para o item de caixa de ferramentas.
